Title: $30 Film School.
Subtitle: .
Authors: Michael Wareham Dean.
Categories: Computers.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=MwSM8WrSvPkC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Demonstrating how to make a film with the help of a DV camera and computer, this entertaining handbook provides detailed instructions on how to create an innovative film on a budget and offers tips on how to distribute, promote, and sell one's finished production, accompanied by a CD-ROM containing sample movies, lessons, interviews, trailers, and other useful tools. Original. (Beginner).
Published Year: 2003.
